title: the Sovereign of Justice
intro: Once the crown jewel of the Valorians, Cyrus was the pinnacle of the Seventh Orderâ€™s "Golden Generation" - a symbol of hope for mortals. Through a series of world-altering events, Cyrus was chosen as the vessel for the Ascension. He shed his mortality to become a Sovereign, joining the ranks of the celestial rulers of the mortal realms. Now possessed of Absolute Authority, Cyrus has transitioned from a protector to a judge. He no longer sees individuals, only "worthiness". To him, the world is a chaotic system that requires the "Definite Judgment" of a god to remain stable.

abilities.name: Heaven's Will
abilities.details: When Cyrus damages an enemy champion with his abilities, the target will be marked by the <span>Heaven's Will[/], increasing the [db]damage[/] they take from Cyrus for a few seconds.

abilities.name: Retribution
abilities.details:
Cyrus launches a barrage of lumious bolts at a target location over a very short duration. Each bolt explodes upon landing, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) to all enemies hit.

The bolts can be blocked by an enemy hero before they reach the target location, and the damage will be dealt to only that target. Casting this ability does not interupt with Cyrus's movement.

abilities.name: Verdict
abilities.details:
Cyrus designates a target area, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) to all enemies hit and slightly [db]slowing[/] them.

After a few seconds, the area erupts with cosmic energy, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) to all enemies within and [db]stunning[/] them.

abilities.name: Singularity
abilities.details:
Cyrus launches a slow-moving, expanding orb of cosmic energy in a target direction, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) to all enemies it passes through.

If Singularity[/] passes through an active Verdict[/] zone, the zone immediately erupts with cosmic energy (secondary effect of that ability).

If Retribution[/] passes through the moving Singularity[/], each bolt will deal bonus [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]).

abilities.name: Judgement
abilities.details:
Cyrus unleashes a radiant blast on all enemies marked by the Heaven's Will[/], dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) to each target.

If the target's health is below a certain threshold, Judgement[/] will [db]execute[/] the target. Enemies are also briefly [db]revealed[/] from the start of the cast time.
